casename: Lwee Kwi Ling Mary v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Edmond Pereira (Edmond Pereira & Partners) for the applicant; Sia Aik Kor (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Constitutional Law/President/Discretionary powers/Whether President has exclusive power to suspend execution of sentence/Republic of Singapore Independence Act (1985 Rev Ed) s 8(1), Criminal Procedure Code (Cap 68, 1985 Rev Ed) s 237(1)
